description:
Krista Lenz is a petite girl who is described as friendly, warm-hearted, and popular to the point where her peers regard her as a goddess or an angel. She was ranked 10th in the trainee class (due to http://anidb.net/ch53535 [Ymir] holding back during the assessment) and was later put into the 41st squad during the invasion of Trost in the year 850. She later develops a fear of facing the Titans and spends much of her time around Ymir.
Source: Wiki
name: Krista Lenz
